sentences.en: Because our own heart, also need to be moisten constantly with comfort.
sentences.cn: 因为我们自己的心田, 也需要不断地滋润和慰藉.

sentences.en: Can be used to decrease the dust, moisten the air.
sentences.cn: 具备喷雾降尘功能,适宜降尘, 湿润空气.

sentences.en: For ease of installation moisten seal cap with water or lubricant.
sentences.cn: 为安装方便,密封套可使用水或润滑剂来润滑.

sentences.en: He used a dampener to moisten the shirts before he ironed them.
sentences.cn: 在熨衬衣前,他用加湿器先湿润了一下.

sentences.en: Her eyes moisten as she listen to the sad story.
sentences.cn: 听著这悲伤的故事,她的眼睛湿润了.

sentences.en: His tongue even strayed out to moisten them.
sentences.cn: 他甚至不知不觉地伸出舌头来舔舔嘴唇.

sentences.en: It can anti - aging, whiten and moisten the skin.
sentences.cn: 具有滋润保湿、美白祛斑、 抗 衰老 、 防过敏等直接美容效果.

sentences.en: Moisten the clay if it seems too dry.
sentences.cn: 如果黏土太干，就把它润润湿。

sentences.en: Moisten the cloth before applying the lotion.
sentences.cn: 在涂擦洗液之前先把布弄湿.

sentences.en: Moisten the cloth slightly before applying the lotion.
sentences.cn: 先把布稍弄潮湿再使用此溶液.

sentences.en: Moisten the towel with cold water and apply it to the wound.
sentences.cn: 把毛巾用冷水浸湿,缚在伤口处.

sentences.en: Moisten your clay , wet the other eye , drink, man.
sentences.cn: 喝酒, 再干一杯, 喝吧, 伙计.

sentences.en: Moisten, Hydrate, Neutral PH, Increase Natural Plant Essence, Moisten Your Skin Completely.
sentences.cn: 滋润, 水合物, 中性条件下, 增加天然植物的精髓, 滋润你的皮肤彻底.

sentences.en: Remove the foil wrapper and moisten the suppository with water.
sentences.cn: 去掉箔纸,用水湿润药栓.

sentences.en: She moistened her lips (= made her lips wet with her tongue ) .
She took a sip of water to moisten her dry throat.
sentences.cn: 她抿了一口水，润一下发干的喉咙。

sentences.en: Teachers are the spring shower that moisten the children's hearts.
sentences.cn: 老师像春雨,滋润孩子们的心田.
